docs.lead_paragraph: Bill Hamid made five saves, including one late against Dom Dwyer, to help D.C. United tie Sporting Kansas City 0-0 on Saturday night in team's last Major League Soccer home opener at RFK Stadium.

docs.lead_paragraph: South Korea's trade minister said on Sunday the government's responses against discriminating action by China towards South Korean companies will be strengthened and he feels "deep concern" over recent measures taken by Beijing.

headline.main: South Korea Says to Act Against China's Discrimination Against South Korean Firms
